description: A chicken pasta bake recipe inspired by Tuscan flavours. This delicious recipe is from Woolworths team member Darlene Toynton from the Cooloola store.
name: Tuscan Chicken Pasta Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g Woolworths COOK chicken breast parcels with spinach & ricotta

recipeInstructions.text: Add pasta, spinach and half the tasty cheese to mushroom mixture and stir to combine. Transfer pasta mixture to a large baking dish. Thickly slice chicken and place over pasta mixture. Sprinkle with remaining tasty cheese. Preheat grill to mediumhigh. Grill for 3 minutes or until cheese is golden. Serve.

Sprinkle with remaining tasty cheese. Preheat grill to mediumhigh. Grill for 3 minutes or until cheese is golden. Serve.
